About the Company: Shanti Educational Initiatives Ltd. is a school management solutions provider. The company manages educational institutions right from play school to grade 12. The company offers services such as project planning, school infrastructure, teacher s empowerment and technology support. The firm was founded in 2009 and is based in Ahemadabad, Gujarat.
